/* Question Find users each role Plot them as bar chart , and sort the names in ascending . */
Database schema Table Roles, columns = [*,role_code role_description
Table Users, columns = [*,user_id, role_code, user_name user_login password
Answer Visualize BAR SELECT role_code , count(*) FROM users GROUP role_code ORDER role_code ASC

/* Question Draw dept code versus , rank by the bar in descending . */

Table PROFESSOR, columns = [*,EMP_NUM, DEPT_CODE PROF_OFFICE PROF_HIGH_DEGREE]
Table STUDENT, columns = [*,STU_NUM, STU_LNAME STU_FNAME STU_INIT, STU_DOB STU_HRS, STU_CLASS STU_GPA, STU_TRANSFER, DEPT_CODE STU_PHONE PROF_NUM]
Answer Visualize BAR SELECT DEPT_CODE , count(*) FROM student GROUP dept_code ORDER

/* Question Show each employee's salary using a bar chart , note use the last name , list in desc by . */
Database schema: Table employees, columns = [*,EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, HIRE_DATE JOB_ID, SALARY, COMMISSION_PCT MANAGER_ID DEPARTMENT_ID]

Table DEPARTMENT, columns = [*,DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME SCHOOL_CODE EMP_NUM, DEPT_EXTENSION]

/* Question Show the different countries the number members from each Visualize by bar chart , list by in descending . */
Database schema: Table member, columns = [*,Member_ID Name Country College_ID

/* Question: Find the total credits of courses provided by different department Plot them as bar chart , and order by the dept_name in descending . */
Database schema: Table department, columns = [*,dept_name, building, budget]
Table course, columns = [*,course_id, title, dept_name, credits]
